```{shinylive-python}
#| standalone: true
#| layout: vertical
#| viewerHeight: 600

from shiny import App, render, ui

verbs = ["bakes", "watches", "writes"]
subjects = ["birds", "bread", "code"]

app_ui = ui.page_fluid(
    ui.input_selectize("verb", "First the verb", verbs),
    ui.input_selectize("subject", "Then the subject", subjects),
    ui.output_ui("html"),
)


def server(input, output, session):
    @output
    @render.ui
    def html():
        return f"Simon {input.verb()} {input.subject()}."


app = App(app_ui, server)
```
